text_paragraphs: Information Note on the Court’s case-law 12

The case concerned the length of civil proceedings instituted by the applicant in March 1991 following a road traffic accident. The proceedings are still pending and have therefore lasted around 8 years and 8 months.
Article 41: The Court awarded the applicant 1,200,000 escudos (PTE) in respect of non-pecuniary damage.
